1.content:
Here we are at the beginning of what could be a very meaningful story with characters developing from the creative input of various authors out there... or an absolute kink-fest with nearly no boundaries and/or fap material! (My bet is on the latter, but who knows?)

Let's try to get some establishing steps at least, maybe consider the setting, just for a start!
1.title: Let's Get Started!

choices: A break between media and reality
Science recreating the fake to true
11.content:
Ah, our world. The "real" world so to speak. We would love to bring the fantasy realm here, especially fans of Pokémon! And it's all the more fun to corrupt our fantasies as well!

But the more important question is, how do we do it?
11.title: The real world

choices: A portal to the Pokémon world
Media leaks may cause user changes
112.content: There are many ways for the crossing of universes. So how shall this one?
112.title: A break between media and reality

1123.content: How about some adult locations? Perhaps a bar or a club?
1123.title: More

11232.content:
You're out on the town tonight, looking to have some fun! Preferably with some good music to dance to and great drinks to match!

That's when you spot a flash of colorful lights down a lonely alley, accompanied by music muffled by the brick walls. You've never seen activity here before, so you decide to investigate further. Your curiosity rewards you with a pleasant sight: a brightly lit club sign hangs over a pair of doors reading, "The Pokéballs" with upbeat music from your favorite game series.

You're delighted to see a Pokémon-themed club, but are curious as to when this club set itself up here! It didn't matter much as you quickly head in, surprised to see that there isn't a bouncer at the entrance, but that just makes it easier to head on inside. You didn't notice before, but there had been a theme to the establishment, though that would apparent as you walk in to see the theme of...
11232.title: Club

1123231.content:
As you walk through the doors, you're greeted by a hallway, filled with colors of white, sky blue, and speckles of yellow.

You have a sneaking suspicion as to what the Pokémon theme was, until it was all confirmed by the tons of Pachirisu paraphernalia and souvenirs lining the walls. You had to admit, Pachirisu was a cute and energetic electric squirrel, but what better way to party?

You finally reach the entrance to the dance floor proper, which is then you realize that this was no ordinary club, but a...
1123231.title: Pachirisu

choices: You decide to turn around and immediately leave!
You try and attempt to leave...
You decide to stay and try to make the most of it.
112323131.content:
Your expectations as to what the club would be like was all thrown out the window as soon as you opened the doors, along with your understanding of reality:

Before you lay your typical dance floor with strobe lights trailing overhead, a good-sized break bar that looked well stocked, and both being occupied by with dozens of excited and content patrons. What was unexpected was the fact that every single one of them were what you concluded to be nude, anthro Pachirisu people! What more was that every single one of them were visibly male, with their oddly snow white human penises flopping about in various states of rigidness, as well as similarly snow white balls grinding against legs and asses.

You yourself were straight and the sight of it was certainly shocking to say the least. With that...
112323131.title: Nude anthro club?

choices: You begin to become enamored by him
You recompose yourself and answer him
1123231313.content:
Though you were obviously not into the situation at hand, you decide that if you were here, you might as well try to make the most of it. After all, the music was great, the place looked pretty clean, and the drinks were being served as though they were free! With your mind made up, you decide to join in the fun, albeit an arms distance away from anyone and their plush tail.

Despite your reluctance to "fully" join in and your appearance as a fully clothed human, the naked Pachirisu men happily welcomed you in to the fun, and even respecting your distance. After some light dancing to some awesome Gen IV music, you decide to hit the bar, being surprised at immediately being served a sky blue martini by the bucked tooth bartender, his cute bow tie complimenting the sweet smile on his face.

You're soon approached by particularly feminine Pachirisu anthro, his wider hips holding his bouncy bubble butt, leading up to a girly hourglass figure that was his chest, and to his long silky blue hair that certainly did not help hide his effeminate looks.

"Hey there cutie~ I'm the owner of this establishment~" he introduces with a seductive tone. "So what's a human like you doing in a Pachi place like this~?"

"W-well..." you stutter, being a bit overwhelmed by the sweet citrus smell that wafted around him.
1123231313.title: You decide to stay and try to make the most of it.

11232313132.content:
"*Ahem* I just happened to find this club while walking through town and, uh, well... I like Pokémon and I thought it was cool to see a Pokémon-themed club!" you manage to say, while trying to keep yourself steady. "I mean this is great and all, but I'm not sure how this is even real! No offence or anything!"

The Pachirisu femboi giggles as he sits next to you. "No worries~! But why would it be weird? We're just being our natural Pachirisu selves here. Nothing out of the ordinary." he 'explains' as he strokes the top of your hand. You pull back, not wanting to give him an opportunity to try something on you, but nevertheless your mind races at different thoughts. You hadn't the heart to question the existence of Pokémon, let alone an anthro one, so you decide to set things straight with the clearly male oriented electric squirrel before you cause offence to him.

"I-I'm sorry. I'm not a homosexual." you quickly explain, expecting him to kick you out of the club, but surprisingly, he simply smiles with at you nervousness.

"It's quite alright sweetie~" he says as he places his paw-hands on his cross-legged lap. "I completely understand, but you should know that just a simple friendly touch isn't a homosexual~" he explains, causing you to blush in embarrassment. "Besides, between a Pachirisu and a human, is it really gay~?"

Before you could argue what he said, he immediately changes the subject with a sweet smile still, "Nevermind sweetie. How about we..."
11232313132.title: You recompose yourself and answer him

choices: He leaves you to your fun
112323131323.title: More

choices: You don't notice his slow advancements and suggestions
1123231313231.content:
"Sure, I guess we can do that" you say, surprised at the seemingly innocent activity he wanted to partake with you. Maybe you were wrong to judge him for being too invasive. Maybe he was just being friendly like he said. You did have to admit, the snowy white fur on his fingers did feel very comforting, the sensual tingling still lingering at the top of your hand. "So what's your name?"

He simply giggled in response, the girly tone making you blush a bit but also left you confused as to why he did so. "Oh you silly human~ Don't you know that all Pokémon don't need silly names? But that's okay, you can call me Pachi since it sounds cute~!"

Your face continues to redden further at the comment, only to increase when he again places his furry paw-hand on your hand, this time with a comforting grip to it. "It's alright, sweetie~ I'm only having a bit of fun. Nobody knows everything so you don't have to feel embarrassed by it~" he says with a comforting tone.

You feel less hot in the face having been relieved by his comforting words and paw-hand, this time keeping in place for him to rub protectively. "Oh... thanks," you say, unsure whether you should apologize or not about your unsure emotions about him.

The thought must have been clear on your face as he squeezes your hand lightly with assurance. "No need to apologize for anything, dear~ Besides, there's nothing homosexual about a guy being comforting by his fellow male, let alone a Pachirisu one!" he says with a chuckle. He does have a point...
1123231313231.title: "Let's just talk~"

choices: Follow the main characters of the series
Follow the minor/recurring characters of the series
12.content:
Ah, the Pokémon world: a land where young children can aspire to be great Pokémon trainers... or a place destined to be corrupted by unfathomable powers by us truly!

This is where the story can start in anyway and proceed in any direction, but please leave at least one option available for other considerations as stated at the beginning!
12.title: The Pokémon world

121.content: Which series shall we dive into?
121.title: Follow the main characters of the series

1211.content: Ah, the animated series! But like the games, there are many regions with every season! Which region in the Pokémon world shall we see?
1211.title: The animation

14.content:
In each of these options, the world is similar to the world of Ash and Pikachu. In fact, Ash and Pikachu might even exist in these worlds somewhere. However, there is at least one difference between the worlds of these options and the world of canon Pokemon

Option 1: All Pokemon are more sentient. They retain the typical Pokemon traits and are still trained by Pokemon trainers but these Pokemon can speak.

Option 2: All Pokemon are anthros. That is, there are anthro-pikachu, anthro-bulbasaur, and anthro-squirtle just to name a few.

Option 3: Someone has found a way to turn boys into Pokemon. (This one is full conversion)

Option 4: Someone has found a way to turn boys into Pokemon. (This one is only partial conversion. The boys are still boys but they get kept in pokeballs)

Option 5: Make up some more worlds and leave a chance for others to make up worlds as well
14.title: The world is like a Pokemon world but different

choices: Jason gets no powers. He's just small and weak.
144.content:
Jason is seventeen. He's been a Pokemon trainer for years and a successful one. He no longer participates in any competitions but he works for the research facilities by capturing wild Pokemon.

One day he is out all alone when he is attacked suddenly by several Pokemon. Jason calls out his Pokemon but they are simply outnumbered. Besides, the attacking Pokemon tend to ignore the other Pokemon and attack Jason himself. Then a Poke ball gets thrown at Jason.

The sensation of being turned into energy is weird. Jason is able to see and hear what is happening outside but waves of euphoria wash over him making it hard for him to care what is happening.
144.title: Pokeboys

choices: The misadventures of Foxy the giant and Goopy the giant.
15.content:
Here's a story option that involves never before seen Pokemon, professional wrestling and sumo wrestling.

The misadventures of Foxy the giant and Goopy the giant: In this story both Foxy A.K.A Foxy the giant and Goopy A.K.A Goopy the giant are never before seen versions of themselves as a pair of anthropomorphic Pokemon who one day see a flyer for the cartoon wrestling league.

The two then decide to sign up with the cartoon wrestling league as they'll both need to gain lots of weight along with becoming huge in the process as they must train and get ready for their debut as Foxy and his tag team partner compete in the huge fat guys tag team division.
15.title: Make your own story option!

info.brief_description: Pokémon Interactive Story... CYOC style! Anything goes as long as there's change!
info.description:
Welcome to the Pokémon CYOC!

Here, I want to make an interactive story for Pokémon-related transformations that was once available on CYOC. Though this is my first time making an interactive story here and it might be a bit ambitious than what I was expecting, but please make do with what I have!
Anything goes as long as there's change! Whether it be physical or mental, tame or explicit, feral or anthro, straight or gay, or anything!

While it is going to be open, I'd like to suggest leaving heavy violence and death out of it! It's only a suggestion though!

Also, let's try to keep things as open and variable as possible by leaving at least one option for other story suggestions!

Without further ado, here we go!
